name: Kat's Hold
description:
This is my #IndiE3Jam entry.

It's just a simple platformer with a strange atmosphere that I put together in 2 hours (my computer is having problems and my graphics card is not working)..

I guess that this is the beauty of IndiE3, with a computer like this I wouldn't even be able to think about E3.

Anyways, I will surely be updating this game and adding UI elements as soon as my computer starts cooperating again.

W,A,S,D - Move

Mouse - Look around

Spacebar - Jump
